changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "cluster" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "ts" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "deleted_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "state" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "promoted_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "legacy_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "name" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "namespace" VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL, "provider" VARCHAR(50) NULL, "external_id" VARCHAR(100) NULL, "kubernetes_version" VARCHAR(50) NULL, "metadata" JSONB NOT NULL, "organization_id" UUID NOT NULL, -- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("organization_id") REFERENCES "organization" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE ); CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "uidx_cluster_org_namespace_active" ON "cluster" ("organization_id", "namespace") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL; CREATE INDEX "idx_cluster_external_id_active" ON "cluster" ("external_id") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL AND "external_id" IS NOT NULL;
